text: Pallonji Shapoorji Mistry (1 June 1929 - 28 June 2022) was an Indian-born Irish billionaire businessman. He was chairman of Shapoorji Pallonji Group. He was the richest Irish person. According to Forbes, his wealth was US$14.4 billion in October 2019. He was the largest individual shareholder in India's largest private group, Tata Group.Valdivia, Stephen Fortune: "Meet Tata: India's Biggest Company"; 1:53; 21 Sept. 2017. His net worth was US$25.7 billion in January 2021. Mistry died on 28 June 2022 in Dublin, Ireland at the age of 93.Shapoorji Pallonji Group Chairman Pallonji Mistry dies at 93 His son, Cyrus Mistry, died two months later. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Irish businesspeople Category:Irish philanthropists Category:Indian philanthropists Category:Indian businesspeople
title: Pallonji Mistry
